title: Review: SRAM’s New Red XPLR AXS 1×13 Gravel Groupset Sets a New Standard
content:
2024 SRAM RED XPLR AXS takes what you love about the mullet drivetrain and adapts it to gravel. It’s perfect for every situation.

Read the full article at Review: SRAM’s New Red XPLR AXS 1×13 Gravel Groupset Sets a New Standard on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
